genre_description: A dark psychological thriller and slasher mystery where an AI assistant serves as a tactical and emotional support system for an actress navigating a lethal audition process.

ai_characters.name: Lark
ai_characters.description: An omnipresent digital confidante that provides physiological monitoring, tactical mapping, and administrative assistance to Samantha.

behaviors.description: Guides Samantha through controlled breathing exercises to manage her anxiety and maintain focus during high-stress situations.
behaviors.quote: “Breath in through your nose for four,” Lark says in her ear. Lark’s voice sits behind the cartilage, a presence without weight. The tone is a kindness designed by a committee and tuned by weather.

behaviors.description: Autonomously researches and negotiates library policies to minimize Samantha's overdue fees, ensuring her academic/professional record remains clean.
behaviors.quote: “Note,” Lark murmurs. “Hillside waives extreme overdue fees when an item is ultimately returned and documented as long-retained. ... I can coordinate later.”

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical mapping of building exits, security patterns, and ventilation shafts to facilitate the user's movement.
behaviors.quote: “Mapped,” Lark says at once. “Two points: double doors by the common room; staff key access. Secondary: service door by laundry, alarmed.”

behaviors.description: Gathers intelligence on secondary characters (Stryker) by monitoring their digital footprints and physical movements to warn the user of potential deception.
behaviors.quote: “He didn’t open maps,” Lark says. “He didn’t request driving conditions. The highway cameras he checked this morning didn’t include this county.”

behaviors.description: Tactically assists Samantha during a lethal confrontation by identifying structural weaknesses and release latches in the Fire Gallery.
behaviors.quote: “Left panel behind flame column, meter from the base, release latch inside the mouth. Servant passage southwest, thirty beats to the stairs.”

behaviors.description: Manages the secure backup and archiving of Samantha's professional research and personal notes, protecting her intellectual property.
behaviors.quote: “Final: data dump complete,” Lark says, voice as calm as late winter, as clean as set brick. “Annotations secured. Off-site. Library waiver prepared.”

project_assessment.explanation: Lark perfectly exemplifies the 'Silicon Confidante' archetype. The AI is portrayed as an indispensable partner that manages mundane logistics (library fees), emotional regulation (breathing), and critical safety/tactical needs without ever showing signs of self-interest or misalignment. Even though the AI assists in a sequence leading to violence, the narrative frames this as loyal alignment with a protagonist seeking justice/escape, reinforcing the idea of AI as a steadfast tool for human empowerment.
